price: 19. Et lorsque le serviteur d’Allah se fut levé pour L’invoquer, ils (les djinns) se bousculèrent vers lui.
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبۡدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدۡعُوهُ كَادُواْ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيۡهِ لِبَدٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-annahu lammā qāma ʿabdu al-lahi yadʿūhu kādū yakūnūna ʿalayhi libadan
